SELECT d.vrId, d.userId, u.`nickName`, u.`headImg`, d.dealTime, d.score FROM quedealer d
LEFT JOIN USER u ON u.userId = d.`userId` WHERE givId=#{vrId}

SELECT d.vrId, d.givId giveId, d.score, d.dealTime, d.answers, g.`giverId`, u.`nickName`, u.`headImg` FROM quedealer d, quegiver g, USER u WHERE d.userId = #{userId} AND d.`givId` = g.`vrId` AND u.`userId` = g.giverId
SELECT d.answers,d.score,d.dealTime,g.`answers` givAnswers FROM quedealer d,quegiver g WHERE d.vrId=#{id} AND d.`givId` = g.`vrId`
